channel.title: Code on Masaki Iwabuchi
channel.description: Recent content in Code on Masaki Iwabuchi

item.title: LimpiDual Touch
item.description: LIMPIDUAL TOUCH Interaction Design | 2009, Academic Work WHY I DID: If we can display information on a transparent surface, how will our experience change? Direct-touch input enables intuitive operation, and touch panels have been mounted on various devices. However, finger occlusion becomes one of the problems when a user touches the display from the front side. Here, inspired from SF movies, one idea to solve this problem is to use “transparent” display.

item.title: Artificial Ephemerality
item.description: Artificial Ephemerality Generative Art | 2018, Academic Work -- - Press "S" to save the current screenshot to your desktop. - Press "T" to turn on/off the music. - Press "P" to pause the generation process. Phase: Concept, Design, Build Period: 08/2018 (1 Week) Team: Sole Project Role: Maker, Coder What I did: Define Experience Concept Method: Moodboard, Research, Iterative coding Technology: processing, p5.
